sqlMap.select: SELECT t1.id course_id, t1.title, a1.file_path, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM td_user_course a2 WHERE a2.course_id=t1.id AND a2.is_deleted='0') count_user FROM td_course t1 LEFT JOIN td_file a1 ON a1.is_deleted = '0' AND t1.img_file_id = a1.id, td_user_course t2 WHERE t1.is_deleted = '0' AND t2.is_deleted = '0' AND t1.id = t2.course_id ORDER BY t1.no asc
